net.jodah.concurrentunit

Class ConcurrentTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jodah.concurrentunit.ConcurrentTestCase

  • public abstract class ConcurrentTestCase
extends Object
    Convenience support class, wrapping a Waiter.
